Definition at line 83 of file OLBFGS.cc.

void OLBFGS::getAction ( Observation &  obs,
Vector &  action,
bool  computeGrad = true 
) [virtual]

Do getAction call twice, with different state/action pairs. The "standard" gradient is computed here. The second sample comes from instantStep().

Reimplemented from libpg::TransformController.

Definition at line 215 of file OLBFGS.cc.

void OLBFGS::instantStep ( Vector &  reward  )  [virtual]

Now that we have a reward we can compute the instant gradients to be used by OLBFGS. We have to compute a second gradient by recalling getAction() with the same observation/action pair chosen before.

Reimplemented from libpg::TransformController.

Definition at line 147 of file OLBFGS.cc.

References OLBFGS::g, OLBFGS::p, sumAndPlot::s, and OLBFGS::updateDirection().

void OLBFGS::setDiscount ( double  d  )  [virtual]

OLBFGS takes over the discounting of the trace, but does pass on the new discount factor to the child controller.

Reimplemented from libpg::TransformController.
